title: Altamont Presents: The Seeing Collection
description:
The Seeing Collection: http://altamontapparel.com

Born from drips and drops, the seeing collection highlights Altamont’s commitment to unique patterns and bold imagery through a collection of wovens, tees, shorts and accessories. 

Each piece presents a confrontation as it stares down the dull as well as peers into the minds and souls of the close-minded pawns.
